price: 29. Iš tiesų, dariusieji nusikaltimus, juokdavosi iš tų, kurie tikėjo,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
